venue.name: Assabet River National Wildlife Refuge visitor center

item.description:
Assabet River National Wildlife Refuge walk, World War II bunker tour, and visitor center grand opening ceremony!

We will begin with a half hour guided tour led by Jan Wright where we will learn about the history of the refuge and get to walk inside a bunker, formerly used to store ammunition during World War II. Then we will explore on our own some of the trails around the Puffer Pond area of the refuge, returning to the visitor center for the 1:00 official grand opening ceremony. The ceremony will include guest speaker US congresswoman Niki Tsongas, and others. Cider donuts, fresh cider and apples provided by Honey Pot and Carver Hill Orchards.

Meet out side of the visitor center at 11 for the Bunker Tour.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside of the visitor center at 11 for the Bunker Tour
item.name: Assabet River National Wildlife Refuge walk
